title: Comparison Production Engine
summary: All comparison pages are produced exclusively through Row Finder → Row Triage → Page Factory.
what_this_is: Defines the sole authorized production pipeline for comparison pages.
structural_problem: Without a single pipeline, logic diverges, quality varies, and structure fragments.
rule: Every comparison page must originate from one Row Finder row, pass Row Triage, and be generated by Page Factory into the fixed schema.
tradeoff: Pages that fail triage are not produced; speed is subordinate to structural integrity.
failure_mode: Outputs become inconsistent, verdict logic loses determinism, and compounding breaks.
structural_impact: Scaling occurs only by refining the pipeline, never by manual edits or per-page structural variation.
